official_title: A bill to establish in the Department of Housing and Urban Development a low-interest loan program to assist low- and middle-income owners of homes to finance necessary major improvements to their homes.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Home Improvement Loan Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make loans to low- and middle-income individuals and families owning one-, two-, or three-family residential structures in order to assist in financing necessary major improvements to their homes. Requires that at least ten percent of such loans outstanding be loans made to elderly homeowners.
